title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2395 - Interest Rates Determined Under Section 924-a Of The Real Property Tax Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2395 - Interest Rates Determined Under Section 924-a Of The Real Property Tax Law

State Regulations
§ 2395.1 - Interest rates determined under section 924-a of the Real Property Tax Law

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IX, pt. 2395

Statutory authority: Real Property Tax Law, §924-a; Tax Law, §§ 170, 171, 475, 509[7], 697[a], 1096[a], 1142[1], [8], 1250, 1415[a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
